name: cypress-auotmation-assignment
description: Cypress project to be used for the automation QA technical challenge

scripts.cy:run:smoke: npm run clean:all && cypress run --env TAGS='@smoke'
scripts.test:headed:chrome: npm run clean:all && cypress run --headed --browser chrome
scripts.test:headed:firefox: npm run clean:all && cypress run --headed --browser firefox
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: npm run clean:all && npx cypress run && npm run allure:report
